methods.name: rescheduleServerRestart
methods.desc: Reschedules the next server restart. The time parameter can either be in either the #h #m #s format, or the HH:MM format.
args: Time in either the #h #m #s format, or the HH:MM format.

methods.name: restartServer
methods.desc: Restarts the Minecraft server. THIS WILL TAKE DOWN JSONAPI FOR A SHORT TIME.

methods.name: stopServer
methods.desc: Stops the Minecraft server. THIS WILL SHUT THE SERVER DOWN AND WILL NOT RESTART IT.

methods.name: startServer
methods.desc: Starts the Minecraft server. DO NOT CALL IF remotetookit.stopServer HAS NOT BEEN CALLED!
